name: solin
description: Comprehensive Solidity static analyzer with 155+ rules for security vulnerabilities, gas optimization, and code quality. Detects reentrancy, access control issues, unchecked calls, timestamp dependence, and provides actionable fix suggestions.

tools.name: analyze_solidity
tools.description: Analyze Solidity smart contract code for security vulnerabilities, gas optimization opportunities, and code quality issues. Returns detailed findings with severity levels, line numbers, and fix recommendations.

code.description: The Solidity source code to analyze

rules.description: Specific rules to enable (optional, all rules by default)

tools.name: list_rules
tools.description: List all available analysis rules with descriptions. Can filter by category (lint, security) or severity (error, warning, info).

tools.name: explain_rule
tools.description: Get detailed explanation of a specific rule including what it checks, why it matters, and how to fix violations.

tools.name: suggest_fixes
tools.description: Analyze code and provide specific, actionable fix suggestions for all detected issues.

code.description: The Solidity source code with issues

issueIndex.description: Index of specific issue to fix (optional, fixes all by default)
